question: The Global Findex Database (GFD) for the year 2017 has been published by which of the following organisations?
option2: Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development
explanation: â€œThe Global Findex database for the year 2017 has been released by the World Bank. The Index depicts the global efforts to promote financial inclusion in their country. As per the report, India has witnessed the largest improvement in access to financial services over the past three years among peers, but India also has the highest share of inactive accounts among peers.
